attributes.action: MP and councillors reform of pay and conditions
attributes.additional_details:
Now that the government are tightening their belts and looking into all public sectors pay, conditions and pensions. I believe that it is only right to have a public review of pay, conditions and pension's for local councillors, elected members of parliament all the way to the prime minister. We understand that we must all play our part in these tough times but that does mean ALL not SOME!

Please sign this petition for the matter to be brought to parliament and a public review be undertaken.
